item.title: getTBinR 0.5.5 now on CRAN - 2017 data.
item.description: The main message from the 2017 data is that in 2017 there were again over 10 million estimated TB cases globally with only a 1.8% decrease in incidence rates compared to 2016. Over the last 10 years progress has been made with an average of a 1…

item.title: Exploring Global Trends in Tuberculosis Incidence Rates - with GetTBinR
item.description: For this post I will be quickly diving into global trends in Tuberculosis incidence rates and exploring whether Tuberculosis eradication is on the horizon. Now to get started, the first step is to get the package (for this post we are using the development version from GitHub) and to load the other packages required for this analysis…
